CustomField.formula: (365*( 4*( (12* VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT( Contract_Years_Previous_Contract__c ),'0'))) + VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT( Contract_Months_Previous_Contract__c ),'0')) ) + VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT( Contract_Weeks_Previous_Contract__c ),'0')) ) + (48*VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT( Contract_Days_Previous_Contract__c ),'0'))))/(48*365)
CustomField.label: Period(prv)
